item.title: Tesla Internship Experience, PhD Student Edition, Summer 2022
item.author: Nathan Petersen
item.description: Me in front of the Tesla HQ in sunny California, USA" Me in front of the Tesla HQ in sunny California, USA I was an electric motor control summer intern at Tesla’s engineering headquarters in Palo Alto, California. It was an awesome adventure! In this article, I describe the key parts of the Tesla internship experience and my thoughts on the whole ordeal. Disclaimer These are my opinions only.
